<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGEN: do NOT edit in this block -->

**command: `/hsv`**

**quick ref:**
> /hsv [h s v] [multiply_r multiply_g multiply_b]

**description:**

```
hsv effect on and off
/hsv 0 -1 0			offset hsv of the image
/hsv 0 0 0	1 1 2   multiply and then offset hsv of the image
/hsv				turn it off
```

<!-- END_AUTOGEN-->
H是色彩，S是深浅，V是明暗。
